## database namespace

We must define a namespace to make the typings work correctly. Otherwise `admin.database()` cannot be called like a function. Temporarily, admin.database is used as the namespace name because we cannot barrel re-export the contents from @<!-- -->firebase/database-types, and we want it to match the namespacing in the re-export inside src/index.d.ts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare namespace database 
```
